pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Plug-in for the Distributed Hydrological Model GEOtop // It analyzes raster maps and other information as input/output files from the Hydrological Distributed Model GEOtop. It contains functions and methods to import maps and other keywords from geotop.inpts file. Some examples with simulation cases of GEOtop 2.x/3.x are presented in the package. Any information about the GEOtop Distributed Hydrological Model source code is available on www.geotop.org. Technical details about the model are available in Endrizzi et al (2014) https:// gmd.copernicus.org/articles/7/2831/2014/gmd-7-2831-2014.html.
